name: Roboscorpion Storm
description:
Of all the places you could crash your attack helicopter, it had to be the Robot Scorpion desert. Armed only with your service pistol, survive as long as possible.

Features procedurally animated scorpions, randomly placed scenario props each attempt and free aim.

Made in seven days for the 2020 7dfps jam.

Mouse sensitivity and Post-processing can be ajusted and disabled, respectivaly, by pausing with ESC.

WASD to move, R to reload.
